name: Dash Around Madly
description:
Dash Around Madly is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. In a chessboard-like battlefield, there is nowhere to hide, and all you can do is survive until the last enemy is eliminated.  Enemies drop gems and coins randomly when they die.  By collecting gems and coins, players can upgrade their equipment and skills.



Attack Method：

  • Dash and Bounce
  • 4 Secondary Attack
  • 3 Props

Game Content：

  • 4 Stages
  • 4 Power-ups
  • 23 Enemies
  • 8 Pickups
  • 12 Achievements

Supports Mouse,keyboard,controller Input
